thread.title: Solomon Airlines appoints APG Network to GSA role in 11 countriesTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Solomon Airlines appoints APG Network to GSA role in 11 countriesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Solomon Airlines appoints APG Network to GSA role in 11 countriesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Solomon Airlines appoints APG Network to GSA role in 11 countries Published on : Monday, October 5, 2015
The national carrier of the Solomon Islands, Solomon Airlines has appointed APG Network as its GSA representative in Canada, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan, the UK and the USA.
Announcing the appointment, the airline’s General Manager – Operations & Commercial, Gus Kraus said APG Network would now provide the airline with full sales and marketing activity in these countries and also provide call centre activity with immediate effect.
“APG Network has a demonstrated reputation and a solid knowledge of local market conditions in the countries where it operates,” Mr Kraus said.“Add to this a proven track record in service delivery, all of which makes it an obvious choice to partner with Solomon Airlines.”
APG Network is the world’s leading network for airline distribution services.With 111 associates and service partners worldwide, the company has a presence in 176 countries and commercial relationships with 180 airlines.
Source:-Solomon Airlines
